body.string: {"model":"gpt-4o","temperature":0.0,"max_completion_tokens":128,"messages":[{"role":"system","content":"You are a helpfull assistant who answers questions succinctly."},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Where am I located?"}]},{"role":"assistant","tool_calls":[{"id":"MpfiuoRaM","type":"function","function":{"name":"get_location","arguments":"{}"}}],"content":[]},{"role":"tool","tool_call_id":"MpfiuoRaM","content":"Seattle, WA, USA"}],"tools":[{"type":"function","function":{"name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country."}}]}
